title: "The Internet Archive's 'Wayforward Machine' paints a grim future for the web"
excerpt: "The Internet Archive is marking its 25th anniversary by peering into the future to predict what the web might look like a quarter of a century from now. The non-profit took the opportunity to rail against internet regulation by offering a grim vision of what lies ahead."
